title: Wilson's Tales of the Borders and of Scotland, Volume 07
author: Various
snippet: Therecame on one of those days of rain and tempest so common in the district;and Sir George, with some of his friends, were storm-bound in a solitarycottage, somewhere on the shores of Loch Broom.
